name: Multiplayer online sepertiga
description:
There are fish, turtles and penguins that live harmoniously in the water. They are playmates and friendly to each other. The story of their friendship is broken. They found that delicious meat
Once upon a time, they found the meat delicious as long as they lived. They ate it with gusto until it remained. And the competition begins to get the most of the meat. The game of each other can protect themselves and survive by stroking his friend.
